name: Spooky Time - even though I hate it
name_original: Spooky Time - even though I hate it
description:
It‘s Halloween again. And just like every year, you absolutely hate it. Why? Children. Kids. Every year they are trying to scare you, trying to steal your candy. However, the tables have turned. You‘re finally taking revenge. How? It‘s easy - by scaring them. Scare those little annoying kids. Scare them so their Halloween is ruined

Controls:

SpookyTime was created for the htk GameJam | Ice Edition by five students

Credits: 

julesse - Programming and Questdesign

Laxene - Programming and Sounddesign

PixlP3rfect - Assets and Animation

Psychony - Assets and Animation

Dawid - Assets and Animation

Special thanks to WeLoveIndies and EpidemicSounds for the awesome material.
